grade_comment:
Grade: 90

Comment: This response provides a detailed and accurate explanation of the concept of the "people of God" in the Old Testament, focusing on the nation of Israel as the chosen people set apart to serve and obey God. The student effectively discusses the covenant relationship God established with Israel, emphasizing the responsibilities and blessings associated with being part of the chosen nation. The response is well-written and showcases a good understanding of the topic from a Christian worldview perspective.
